abstract: How both sides are choosing the people who will make their case before the Senate.
lead_paragraph: In the coming days, Ms. Pelosi is expected to choose a half dozen or so managers to argue on the Senate floor for President Trumpâ€™s removal from office. Those managers, who will be selected at least partly from the House Judiciary and Intelligence committees, form just one element of a trial full of complicated procedures.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
